alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Hooker; Thomas; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 7:13PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Cherry, eastern Hooker and northwestern Thomas Counties through 800 PM CDT/700 PM MDT/... At 712 PM CDT/612 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Mullen, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mullen, Thedford, Seneca, Norway, Highway 97 crossing the Dismal River and Kelso. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 184 and 210. Highway 97 between mile markers 48 and 67. Highway 83 between mile markers 142 and 148. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT/1000 PM MDT/ for north central and west central Nebraska.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Cherry; Hooker; Thomas; Western Cherry
